content.p: For each characteristic listed below, choose whether or not it describes cardiac muscle cells (compared to skeletal muscle cells).

response.feedback: Incorrect. Skeletal muscle cells rely on the action of nerves and neurotransmitters to depolarize. Cardiac muscle can depolarize spontaneously.
Correct. Skeletal muscle cells rely on the action of nerves and neurotransmitters to depolarize. Cardiac muscle can depolarize spontaneously.

part.hint: Cardiac muscle cells have a more positive resting potential than skeletal muscle cells, that changes slowly as they spontaneously depolarize.
The dependence on external calcium to generate potentials is an important difference between cardiac muscle cells and skeletal muscle cells.
